title: Adc Main Looking for Serious Team
body:
Hi, Im an ADC Main since season 3 and have been quite efficient with the role, I can really play well with any new support i get.

I was gold 5 in season 4 and plat 4 in season 3 and currently sitting silver 4 but i havent been playing much this season yet.

My time schedule is pretty flexible and usually able to play A LOT everyday.

replies.body: Add a guy called wolves and he might be able to sort something out for you
